com.unibet.worktest.dao

Interface TransactionDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionDaoImpl

    public interface TransactionDao
    Interface for data access operations on database tables transaction_history and transaction_leg
    Author:
    Moupiya

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteTables()
      Deletes data from transaction_history and transaction_leg for testing
      com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction getTransactionByTransactionRef(java.lang.String transactionRef)
      Fetches transaction details for specified transaction reference from transaction_history table

      Fetches a set of transaction references for specified account reference from transaction_history table

      Fetches transaction details for a set of transaction references from transaction_history table
      void saveTransaction(com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction transaction)
      Stores the transaction details in transaction_history table and details of transaction legs in transaction_leg table

    • Method Detail

      • saveTransaction

        void saveTransaction(com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction transaction)
        Stores the transaction details in transaction_history table and details of transaction legs in transaction_leg table
        Parameters:
        transaction - a monetary transaction between at least two different accounts
        See Also:
        Transaction

      • getTransactionRefsByAccountRef

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTransactionRefsByAccountRef(java.lang.String accountRef)
        Fetches a set of transaction references for specified account reference from transaction_history table
        Parameters:
        accountRef - client specified account reference
        Returns:
        a set of transaction references

      • getTransactions

        java.util.List<com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction> getTransactions(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> transactionRefs)
        Fetches transaction details for a set of transaction references from transaction_history table
        Parameters:
        transactionRefs - client specified transaction reference
        Returns:
        a list of transaction objects or an empty list if not found
        See Also:
        Transaction

      • getTransactionByTransactionRef

        com.unibet.worktest.bank.Transaction getTransactionByTransactionRef(java.lang.String transactionRef)
        Fetches transaction details for specified transaction reference from transaction_history table
        Parameters:
        transactionRef - client specified transaction reference
        Returns:
        an instance of transaction object or null if not found in transaction_history table
        See Also:
        Transaction
